about_the_game:
Listen to all the original music created by our friends, AnM Produtions for .EXE!

1.) .EXE (Title)
2.) Java (Easy Levels)
3.) PHP (Medium Levels)
4.) C++ (Hard Levels)
5.) Debugger.EXE (Boss Levels)
6.) Encapsulation (Dark Levels)
7.) Chaos_Model.EXE (Alerted Levels)
8.) Glitch.EXE (Countdown Levels)
9.) Access_Violation.EXE (Final Boss)
10.) Lightway_Particles.EXE (Credits)
detailed_description:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: QuadCore 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
